content.text: 1 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
content.eamr: ( ing-2 "1 red bell pepper, seeded and diced" )
( ing-6 "1 (4 ounce) package feta cheese, crumbled" )

content.text: 1 pinch salt and pepper to taste
content.eamr: ( ing-8 "1 pinch salt and pepper to taste" )

content.text: 0) In a serving bowl, mix together the chicken, celery, and red onion.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "mix"@22:25 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the chicken"@35:46 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "celery"@48:54 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-3 "red onion"@60:69 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a serving bowl"@6:20 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a separate bowl, stir together the mayonnaise, sour cream, feta cheese, and dill.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "stir"@23:27 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-4 "the mayonnaise"@37:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "sour cream"@53:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "feta cheese"@65:76 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "dill"@82:86 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a separate bowl"@6:21 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Pour over the chicken mixture, and stir to blend.
3) Taste, and season with salt and pepper as needed.
4) Serve immediately, or refrigerate until serving.
